確信.definition: to be convinced; to be sure; to firmly believe; to be positive that; definite news

確定.definition: definite; certain; fixed; to fix (on sth); to determine; to be sure; to ensure; to make certain; to ascertain; to clinch; to recognize; to confirm; OK (on computer dialog box)

確山.definition: Queshan county in Zhumadian 駐馬店|驻马店[Zhu4 ma3 dian4], Henan

確山縣.definition: Queshan county in Zhumadian 駐馬店|驻马店[Zhu4 ma3 dian4], Henan

確診.definition: to make a definite diagnosis; confirmed (case of a specific disease)

確證.definition: to prove; to confirm; to corroborate; convincing proof

確鑿.definition: definite; conclusive; undeniable; authentic; also pr. [que4 zuo4]
